title: Gun Shots SFX Pack
description: A pack of 138 Gun Shots sounds for your game,  synthesized and recorded on a quality microphone.
longDescription:
SFX PlayList: SoundCloud

-------

What's in the package:

40 wav of Ambience

58 wav of Scary Impacts

29 wav of Hits

------------------------------------------------------------

A pack of 138 Gun Shots sounds for your game, synthesized and recorded on a quality microphone,sounds are great for pistols, machine guns, rifles, shotguns and their reloading, there are also explosions in this pack 

------------------------------------------------------------

Hello, my name is Pavel also called Graninbeatz, I am a music composer and sound designer, I have worked in various game development companies, I am open for cooperation - Graninbeatz@gmail.com  

questions, news, suggestions what to add and more other is in discord group

Discord channel: https://discord.gg/SWJkbWsppX

Email: Graninbeatz@gmail.com

Instagram: pavel_granin1
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  synthesized and realistic
  •  high quality
